page.title: 04DISTRICT COUNCILLOR (2)
page.content: The District Councillor in our parish is called Mrs Down. Mrs Down does not have many complaints or problems. However she has one big problem that often comes up: it is about homeless people whom she has to help. She has another problem which annoys her and this problem is about people wanting to build a {ring road} around{Salisbury}and through the{ {Woodford Valley. }I think it is sad to spoil this beautiful valley with a horrible noisy {Ring Road,}and I hope it will be built around the South of{ {Salisbury.} { }
